text: Mariyu akasalalo unnadanta mariyu bhumilo unnadanta allah ku cendinade. Mariyu vastavaniki memu allah yandu bhayabhaktulu kaligi undamani, purvam grantham iccina variki mariyu miku ajnapincamu. Mariyu okavela miru tiraskariste bhumyakasalalo unnadanta niscayanga, allah ke cendinadi. Mariyu allah svayam samrd'dhudu, sarvastotralaku ar'hudu
